channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Pothole in the tarmac pavement with visible cavity underneath, 1st July
item.description:
On the left just before Daisybank going up Leckhampton Road there is a hole in the tarmac pavement with a visible cavity underneath. Possibility of a minor collapse of the footpath.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Leckhampton Hill, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Light Priorities have changed, 1st July
item.description:
The Traffic Lights at Commerce road are staying on red longer for the traffic between Churchdown and Cheltenham. This is a change from normal. it is causing traffic to back up.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road East, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Green or amber traffic light is not working
